com.phunware.location.provider

Class PwFusedLocationProviderZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.location.provider.PwFusedLocationProviderZone

  • public class PwFusedLocationProviderZone
extends java.lang.Object
    The 'PwFusedLocationProviderZone' class defines a zone where a particular location provider should be used. The zone will be considered valid for use only if the location given by the location provider has a coordinate inside the polygon region and if the floorID of the location is contained in the floorIDs array. Created by Xiangwei Wang on 7/15/15.

        polygonOptions - A polygon that encompasses the zone where the location provider should be used
        floorIdentifiers - An array of integers that indicate the floors where the polygon for this zone is be valid
